item_1.description:
Industrial Grade Cable Ties
    - UV Resistant
    - Color: Black
    - Length: 300mm
    - Width: 7.6mm
    - Quantity: 1000

supplier_1.notes: Exact match for specifications. Product is sold in packs of 100, so 10 packs would be needed to meet the quantity requirement of 1000.

supplier_2.notes: Found supplier in directory that specializes in industrial fasteners. Need to check website for product details and confirm they offer cable ties matching our specifications.

item_2.description:
Ergonomic Office Chair
    - Adjustable Height
    - Lumbar Support
    - Swivel Base
    - Color: Grey
    - Quantity: 5

supplier_1.notes: Close match to specifications. Chair has Dark Grey color instead of Grey as specified, but includes all required features (adjustable height, lumbar support, swivel base). Additional features include mesh back and fabric seat.

supplier_2.notes: Found supplier in directory that specializes in office chairs. Need to check website for product details and confirm they offer chairs matching our specifications.

general_notes: For Item 1, Supplier A offers an exact match but in packs of 100, requiring 10 packs to meet our quantity needs. Supplier C also offers cable ties but they don't meet the width specification (4.8mm vs. required 7.6mm) and aren't specified as UV resistant. For Item 2, Supplier B offers a close match with Dark Grey color instead of Grey. Supplier C offers a basic office chair in Grey but doesn't specify if it has lumbar support. For both items, additional suppliers were identified from the Industry Directory that would require further investigation.
